questions.question: I ____ (finish) my homework by 8 PM.
questions.example: I will have finished my homework by 8 PM.

questions.question: She ____ (graduate) from university by next year.
questions.example: She will have graduated from university by next year.

questions.question: They ____ (build) the house by December.
questions.example: They will have built the house by December.

questions.question: We ____ (travel) to five countries by the end of the year.
questions.example: We will have traveled to five countries by the end of the year.

questions.question: He ____ (complete) the project before the deadline.
questions.example: He will have completed the project before the deadline.

questions.question: You ____ (learn) Spanish by the time you move to Spain.
questions.example: You will have learned Spanish by the time you move to Spain.
